definitions.text: pick out, select, or choose from a number of alternatives
examples: Take any one of these cards
Choose a good husband for your daughter
She selected a pair of shoes from among the dozen the salesgirl had shown her

definitions.text: select as an alternative over another
examples: I always choose the fish over the meat courses in this restaurant
She opted for the job on the East coast

definitions.text: see fit or proper to act in a certain way; decide to act in a certain way
examples: She chose not to attend classes and now she failed the exam
